---
name: severity.High
about: A flaw that affects most users and causes major problems for users. i.e., only
  problems that make the product almost unusable for most users should have this label.
title: "[BUG-HIGH]"
labels: ''
assignees: ''

---

**Describe the bug**
A clear and concise description of what the bug is.

**To Reproduce**
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. Go to '...'
2. Click on '....'
3. Scroll down to '....'
4. See error

**Expected behavior**
A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen.

**Screenshots**
If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your problem.
